content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":496049,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/40479f41-2e48-4533-b266-50d07bbaec3b/opt.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/40479f41-2e48-4533-b266-50d07bbaec3b/opt.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"opt.PNG\",\"name\":\"opt.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"40479f41-2e48-4533-b266-50d07bbaec3b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":647,\"height\":132},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe you will become a part of EPAM’s success and share in the pride of working for one of the world’s most progressive IT companies, as well as find a lot of opportunities for personal and professional growth.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s Onboarding Portal is aimed to provide you with additional information about our company and details about internal systems. Please take a few moments to acquaint yourself with these helpful resources.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We know that you are very interested in how this impacts you and your colleagues in your immediate day-to-day operations. Most of your activities will remain unchanged, but there will be some additional activities that you will be asked to participate in as we integrate Optiva Media team into EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There will be additional communications about the training program to onboard you to various EPAM Applications and Tools. In order to prepare for these trainings, we will be importing Optiva Media data loads into EPAM’s systems in an effort to minimize duplication or increasing workloads.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We’re very happy to have you on board!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:SupportAcquisition@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support Acquisition\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in case you have any questions during your transition period to EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thank you and welcome to the team!\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
